Uses of Package
se.bricole.xss.server

Packages that use se.bricole.xss.server
com.example   
se.bricole.xss.modules   
se.bricole.xss.server   
 

Classes in se.bricole.xss.server used by com.example
ClientProxy
          The ClientProxy object acts as the gateway between clients.
ClientSession
           Each ClientConnection is associated with exactly one client, and is therefore the primary interface for all client I/O and communication.
Module
           An XML module does not usually need to implement this interface, since it is inherited by the XMLSessionTagHandler and XMLTagHandler interfaces.
ParserException
          A ParserException is thrown whenever the XML parser failed to generate a valid document from supplied XML data.
XMLModule
           
XMLTagHandler
          This interface should be implemented by stateless modules.
 

Classes in se.bricole.xss.server used by se.bricole.xss.modules
AuthHandler
          A regular AuthHandler (also called "Authenticator" elsewhere in the documentation).
AuthHandlerPassive
          This passive AuthHandler also specifies a method of retreiving the password for a specific user, letting the server handle the authentication process (thus allowing use of MD5 authentication implemented in XSS).
ClientProxy
          The ClientProxy object acts as the gateway between clients.
ClientSession
           Each ClientConnection is associated with exactly one client, and is therefore the primary interface for all client I/O and communication.
Configuration
          Handles loading of configuration and modules.
Module
           An XML module does not usually need to implement this interface, since it is inherited by the XMLSessionTagHandler and XMLTagHandler interfaces.
ModuleException
          An exception that can be thrown from a module or by the servers' module loader.
ModuleRegistrar
          A Registrar module is a module that needs access to the Configuration object outside client access.
SessionEventListener
          The ClientEventListener interface is used for classes that wants to be informed of added and removed clients in a ClientProxy.
XMLModule
           
XMLSessionTagHandler
          This interface should be implemented by all Stateful XML modules (a.k.a.
XMLTagHandler
          This interface should be implemented by stateless modules.
